tool_description: Africa-Api is a comprehensive project that provides a vast range of data about Africa, including countries, languages, tourism destinations, colonial history, and much more. This project offers a user-friendly interface that enables users to easily access and retrieve data about different African countries and their respective histories, languages, and cultures. The Africa-Api project is an invaluable resource for individuals or organizations looking to learn more about the African continent.

api_list.name: tourism[Per Country]
api_list.description: Returns best tourism locations and categories you can explore in a specific country in Africa.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which tourism information is requested.

api_list.name: independence[All Countries]
api_list.description: Returns information about a country's independence date and the colonizer(s) if the country name is provided.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which independence information is requested.

api_list.name: languages[Per Country]
api_list.description: Returns a list of all languages spoken in a specific country in Africa.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which language information is requested.

api_list.name: sizes[All Countries]
api_list.description: Gets the sizes of all countries in Africa.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which size information is requested.

api_list.name: resources[Per Country]
api_list.description: Provides a list of the most important resources that an African country relies on for its economy.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which resource information is requested.

api_list.name: countries[All Countries]
api_list.description: Returns a list of all countries in Africa with details such as name, latitude, longitude, phone code, abbreviation, and capital city.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: Specify 'all' to get information on all countries.

api_list.name: tourism[All Countries]
api_list.description: Returns best tourism locations and categories you can explore in each country in Africa.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: Specify 'all' to get tourism information for all countries.

api_list.name: languages[All Countries]
api_list.description: Returns a list of all languages spoken in each country in Africa.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: Specify 'all' to get language information for all countries.

api_list.name: sizes[Per Country]
api_list.description: Gets the size of a specific country.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which size information is requested.

api_list.name: province/state/county[Per Country]
api_list.description: Returns information about provinces, states, or counties in a specific country in Africa.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which county information is requested.

api_list.name: independence[Per Country]
api_list.description: Returns information about a country's independence date and the colonizer(s) if the country name is provided.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which independence information is requested.

api_list.name: resources[All Countries]
api_list.description: Provides a list of the most important resources that each African country relies on for its economy.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: Specify 'all' to get resource information for all countries.

api_list.name: country[Specific Country]
api_list.description: Returns detailed information about a specific country in Africa, such as name, latitude, longitude, phone code, abbreviation, and capital city.

required_parameters.name: country_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the specific country for which information is requested.
